page.title: 17Religion Cont.
page.content:
{The Apostolic Church { This Church is about thirty years old. The{Apostolic Church}has a{Sunday {School}which starts at lO.OO am and finishes at ll.OO am. Some people go to the night service which starts at 7.OO pm and finishes at 8.OO pm. About 2O people go. Once a{Chinese couple came to the Service. There are {8OO Catholic families}in this area.
{Crossbeck Convent { {Crossbeck Convent is}situated in{ {Eston.}The Convent has been open for nearly{lOO years.}The{Order}is the {Sisters of Mercy}which was founded by {Catherine McAuley}in{Dublin}in l832. Its purpose is to provide medical treatment and education for poor people.
